Title: ZendFramework potential Cross-site Scripting vector in `Zend_Dojo_View_Helper_Editor`
Description: `Zend_Dojo_View_Helper_Editor` was incorrectly decorating a TEXTAREA instead of a DIV. The Dojo team has reported that this has security implications as the rich text editor they use is unable to escape content for a TEXTAREA.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.7.0 before 1.7.9, all versions starting from 1.8.0 before 1.8.5, all versions starting from 1.9.0 before 1.9.7
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.7.0, all versions starting from 1.7.9 before 1.8.0, all versions starting from 1.8.5 before 1.9.0, all versions starting from 1.9.7
